heading: Parody.
general-note: Here are entered works on the literary form of humorous or satirical imitation of a serious piece of literature. Collections of parodies in several languages or of several literatures, in the English language, or of English and American literature are entered under. Parodies.. Collections in other languages or in other literatures are entered under. Parodies. qualified by language or nationality, e.g.. Parodies, French..
